name: Regence
description:
This game is currently still being developed. I only wanted to post it because I wanted to see if there are people who could help give some ideas or criticism.

I didn't make the controls or ways to play clear in the game yet so here is the description for those.

Controls-

Move- WASD, Jump- Space, Inventory- Tab, Pause Menu- Escape

Combat- Open inventory and place a sword in the EQUIP slot on the bottom right then close inventory. To swing sword, hold the left mouse button and move the mouse in the direction you want to attack.

In development:

-Adding way to craft weapons, shields, and armor

-Adding enemies to attack

-Adding quests
